statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 4 , 12 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} + 9 \, x + 8 , -3 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 1 , 21 \, x^{3} - 27 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 19 , -6 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
